name: Hilton Worldwide
description: Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc., a hospitality company, engages in managing, franchising, owning, and leasing hotels and resorts. It operates in two segments, Management and Franchise, and Ownership. The company engages in the hotel management and licensing of its brand names, trademarks, and service marks. It operates a portfolio of luxury, lifestyle, full service, focused service, all-suites, timeshare, and economy hotels under the Waldorf Astoria Hotels & Resorts, Waldorf Astoria Costa Rica Punta Cacique, LXR Hotels & Resorts, Conrad Hotels & Resorts, Canopy by Hilton, Curio Collection by Hilton, Tapestry Collection by Hilton, Tempo by Hilton, Motto by Hilton, NoMad Hotels, Signia by Hilton, Hilton Hotels & Resorts, Graduate by Hilton, Do
